name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.blockreport.intervalMsec
description: Determines block reporting interval in milliseconds.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.max.outstanding.paths
description:
Defines the maximum number of paths to satisfy that can be queued up in the
    Satisfier call queue in a period of time. Default value is 10000.

name: dfs.client.retry.max.attempts
description: Max retry attempts for DFSClient talking to namenodes.

name: mapreduce.job.counters.max
description: The max number of user counters allowed per job.

name: ipc.ping.interval
description:
Timeout on waiting response from server, in milliseconds.
  The client will send ping when the interval is passed without receiving bytes,
  if ipc.client.ping is set to true.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.joblist.cache.size
description: Size of the job list cache

name: dfs.namenode.block.deletion.increment
description:
The number of block deletion increment.
      This setting will control the block increment deletion rate to
      ensure that other waiters on the lock can get in.
